tasks.label: Setup: venv + requirements
args: if (-not (Test-Path ./.env) -and (Test-Path ./.env.example)) { Copy-Item ./.env.example ./.env -Force }; if (-not (Test-Path ./.venv/Scripts/python.exe) -and -not (Test-Path ./.venv_build/Scripts/python.exe)) { if (Get-Command py -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { py -3 -m venv ./.venv } else { python -m venv ./.venv } }; $py = (Test-Path ./.venv_build/Scripts/python.exe) ? './.venv_build/Scripts/python.exe' : './.venv/Scripts/python.exe'; & $py -m pip install --upgrade pip; & $py -m pip install -r requirements.txt
